content.title: Extracorporeal Shock Wave Lithotripsy

content.statement: Extracorporeal Shock Wave Lithotripsy is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Urology that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Extracorporeal Shock Wave Lithotripsy include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Extracorporeal Shock Wave Lithotripsy.
